EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-02-20 Container Adoption.ES- 20190220-Invite 2.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you In or Out?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRY5AAM]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRY5AAM]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The rate of container adoption is increasing rapidly. According to Gartner, 50% of organizations will be running containerized applications by next year. Are you and your team ready for production?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRY5AAM]]>
Attend tomorrow's webinar, Benchmarking Your Container Adoption in 2019 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRY5AAM]]> at 11 am ET where you will learn the emerging trends, why the built in knobs are limited, and how you can overcome the roadblocks to managing containers at scale and across multiple clouds. Register now and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. See you then, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRY5AAM]]> and we will share the recording with you afterward.
